bug.author: asiletto
bug.description: I played with the params (nCharactersToSample = 1000, tbpttLength = 20, numEpochs = 20) on org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.character.GravesLSTMCharModellingExample. Not understanding exactly what's happened. Trained on Nicomachean Ethics. Maybe it does not like Aristotle? :) o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1325 is 24.79880790851231 o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1330 is 24.16668392113297 o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1335 is 24.094354076575982 o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1340 is 23.442071097925275 o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1345 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1350 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1355 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1360 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1365 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1370 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1375 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1380 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1385 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1390 is NaN o.d.o.l.ScoreIterationListener - Score at iteration 1395 is NaN Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 498881 at org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.character.CharacterIterator.next(CharacterIterator.java:164) at org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.character.CharacterIterator.next(CharacterIterator.java:142) at org.deeplearning4j.examples.recurrent.character.GravesLSTMCharModellingExample.main(GravesLSTMCharModellingExample.java:102)
